name: Sheltergotchi
description:
Virtual Pet Simulation

You adopted the cutest boi from a shelter. Take good care of him, don't let him go hungry or be bored too long. Let the page play in the background and come back every once in a while to pet your virtual sheltergotchi.

Created in 48hours for the Global Game Jam 2021.

Theme: Lost and Found

Controls: Mouse, to throw a ball, click where you want to throw it. Press Delete to remove pet data

Credits: 

  • Graphics, Concept, SFX: Lucie Tvarohová
  • Coding: Ondřej Paška  
  • Music: Ondřej Trhoň
